Title: The Collector
Cast: Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne, Maurice Dallimore
Plot: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there. Freddie, a socially withdrawn bank clerk and butterfly collector, decides to expand to collecting human specimens. That's where art student Miranda Grey comes in. Miranda matches wits with Freddie the icy psychopath. Written by A.M.Putnam
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 7 nominations.
Actors: Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne
Writer: John Fowles (novel), John Kohn (screenplay) | 1 more credit »
Description: Directed by William Wyler.  With Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne, Maurice Dallimore. A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there.
